content: सविशेष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Possessing characteristic qualities. {@--2@} Peculiar, extraordinary. {@--3@} Special, particular; <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--4@} Pre-eminent, superior, excellent. {@--5@} Discriminative. ( सविशेषं and सविशेषतस् are used adverbially in the sense of ‘especially’, particularly’, ‘exceedingly’; अनेन धर्मः सविशेषमद्य मे त्रिवर्गसारः प्रतिभाति भामिनि <ls>Ku. 5. 38</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>; <ls>Ku. 1. 27</ls>, <ls>R. 16. 53</ls>).
